Our mission

By placing distributed ledger technology at the heart of digital transformation, we increase cyber security, reduce bureaucracy and replace legacy systems. With this, businesses and governments become more efficient.

Smart implementation of blockchain redefines the trust we place in each other, making interactions more transparent, fair and reliable. This is why we will impact on the World Happiness Index, giving everyone access to knowledge, integrating developing countries into the global economy and  bringing joy to people’s lives.

Here is our historyDrag it

2011

Oleg Strelenko, the founder of the project, started creating his own cryptocurrency: DCoin.

April 2014

Release of DCoin: a cryptocurrency viable without exchanges, banks and other mediators. 66 types of transactions, 77 currencies, video identification and an integrated exchange system for converting DCoin into cash.

December 2014

DCoin rewritten from PHP to Go (more than 73,000 lines of code). Works on Win (64/32), OSX (64/32), Linux (64/32), FreeBSD (64/32), Android, IOS, supports PostgreSQL, SQLite, MySQL.

January 2016

DCoin attracts its first investor.

June 2016

Work starts on creating the first blockchain platform prototype as part of the Daylight project. The first office opens in Moscow.

October 2016

The first versions of the web system, plus Simvolio and Prototypo programming languages are created. The project is renamed as eGaaS (electronic Government as a Service).

Spring 2017

The test network is launched. The concept and ideology of smart contracts alongside a platform legal system is developed. The proof of concept for the first projects is validated for the UAE, India and Luxembourg.

July 2017

An office is opened in Luxembourg.

August 2017

The platform’s application is expanded so that it may be implemented outside of eGovernment. Apla is born: a team of experts for developing and integrating blockchain solutions. eGaaS is accepted into the Luxembourg centre for fintech.

Autumn 2017

Proprietary products (programming client, Simvolo and Protypo languages) are perfected. The visual editor and builder for interfaces is created.

By 2018

Apla Enterprise Network (AEN) blockchain network is launched for business. The network speed is increased by 5-10 times (to 1,500 tx/s). Offices open in Dubai, Singapore and New York.

Leadership

Leadership in innovations makes an impact on a global scale. Multicultural, multidisciplinary and diverse top-management allows Apla to speak in one language with worldwide leaders from prime ministers to CIOs.

Our leaders eat last. Creating a workplace of the future: bureaucracy free, with a greater purpose, based on constant learning and individuality at its core.

Oleg
Strelenko

Founder
Blockchain visionary, strong believer and creator of Apla’s unique technology.
Blockchain visionary, strong believer and creator of Apla’s unique technology. EAn early adopter of blockchain, Oleg created his own decentralized electronic currency DCoin in 2011. As he completed 73,000 lines Go code and attracted investors, he realized the future potential is much bigger. In 2016 Oleg launched eGaaS (electronic Government as a Service) and became one of the pioneers of ICO market. This work was crucial for the Apla project and built a solid foundation for the current progress.

Michael
Aprossine

Chief Business Development Officer
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur.
Michael is a blockchain evangelist and a serial entrepreneur with more than 20 years’ experience in IT. Extensive industry knowledge and the desire to shake things up compelled Michael to launch a number of online startups from dotcoms to the internet of things and blockchain. An expert in strategic planning and new business model incorporation, Michael is developing Apla partnership programs and attracting customers around the world. He holds an Executive MBA and is a bachelor of Social Science. Worked as a co-founder and CEO of USDC SlotLogic S.A.R.L., as a marketing director at Korston Group, as BDO at FTS Maconomy and Ciscom.

Vitaly
Bondar

Chief Executive Officer
Vitaly is an expert in legal regulation of blockchain, fintech and private international law.
Vitaly is an expert in legal regulation of blockchain, fintech and private international law. He is a Chief Legal Officer of Apla and a CEO of the Luxembourg-based law firm ChristmannSchmitt. Over the past 15 years, he has held senior positions at large international law firms and industrial companies with a focus on cross-border mergers and acquisitions, and transaction structuring. Vitaly holds an LL.M. (Legum Magister) degree in International Banking and Commercial Law after receiving advanced study at Queen Mary University in London.

Muhammed
Arafath

Executive Director MENA
An outstanding expert in blockchain implementation and keynote speaker on a global scale.
An outstanding expert in digital transformation, Apla’s Executive Director and key speaker on a global scale. As a speaker or chair, he often attends the events like the Gartner Symposium/ITxpo, TRESCON and the World Blockchain Summit. A graduate from Southern Cross University (Australia), Muhammed is a certified Blockchain business analyst, and has over 10+ years of experience working with diverse industries and international markets. Не is actively working with governmentals and businesses to help them adopt blockchain. Advisor of the World Blockchain Foundation, former principal consultant at Finesse Global (Dubai), and business analyst at Quosphere and UXL Consulting.

Team is everything

Welcome to the world where everyone’s invited to form deep, meaningful connections.

Alexander
Boldachev

System Architect
Alexander is a futurologist and a blockchain architect
Alexander is a philosopher, analyst, and member of the Association of Russian Futurologists. His primary areas of research are: global evolutionism, temporal ontology, philosophy of artificial intelligence, and futurology. Works on the creation of a subject-event approach to complex systems modeling. Alexander created the concept of Smart Laws, developed an ideology for smart contracts and a number of Apla’s dApps and digital ecosystems. He is one of our key speakers at European events like Future Tech (St. Petersburg), Blockchain Weekend and #Decenter Cryptoevent (Moscow), Blockchain Conference (Kiev).

Brovkin

Head of Developer Marketing
Technical and business expert responsible for implementing blockchain.
Well-versed in both technical and business areas, Dmitry often represents Apla at international conferences, promoting the platform and training our partners in Europe and Asia. An entrepreneurial spirit combined with international business training and software development experience in the past makes Dmitry a valuable asset for the Apla team. He has a degree in Project Management.

Igor
Chertov

Lead Front End Developer
A gifted developer and blockchain enthusiast.
Igor is a gifted developer and blockchain enthusiast. Has a deep knowledge of the full cycle development of cross-platform, hybrid mobile applications for web and desktop environments, as well as in relational SQL and document-based data stores. Igor received a degree in Information Technology and has since acquired the title of Microsoft-Certified Solutions Developer (MCSD).

Yuriy
Lomakin

Front End Developer, Tester
UX/UI developer, JavaScript, Angular and jQuery ninja, HTML5 and CSS guru.
Yuriy has over 15 years of development experience. A UX/UI developer, JavaScript, Angular and jQuery ninja, HTML5 and CSS guru: he has solid skills and is a highly efficient team member. Yuriy has previously worked for major news portals and top advertising agencies with a very intense and diversified workload.

Alexey
Krivonogov

Lead Back End Developer
25 years’ programming experience and developer of entire platform programming interface.
After 25 years of self-perfection in programming, Alexey created essential solutions that provide the basis for Apla’s main benefits: its high usability and rapid application development. He constructed the programming languages Simvolio and Protypo, and the entire platform programming interface. Alexey became a co-developer of Apla’s predecessor project, DCoin cryptocurrency. Has a degree in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics.

Vasily
Starovetskiy

Platform Applications Developer
Master of Delphi, C++, PL/SQL, Unity (C#), with experience working for energy giants.
Master of Delphi, C++, PL/SQL, Unity (C#). Vasily has a degree in Engineering and Security of Information Systems. Before Apla, he worked as a programmer for an energy giant and the leader of sustainable energy market of CIS countries.

Dmitry
Chertkov

Senior Backend Developer
Outstanding professional in PHP, Node.js and Golang with over 12 years’ experience.
With more than 12 years of experience in programming, Dmitry is an outstanding professional in PHP, Node.js and Golang. He developed digital content for a major Russian telecom businesses and has more than 5 years of experience in leading programmers team.

Alexandra
Khasirdzeva

Business Analyst

A global citizen who lived in Moscow, Jordan, Dubai and LA working in startups. Developing content on innovation and emerging tech, Alexandra had a chance to interact with many industry leaders and visionaries. Later she succeeded in developing new business strategies for expansion, and created a global startup accelerator program in the UAE. Alexandra studied at the University of Edinburgh and the University of Southern California, with a BA in Economics.

Adam
Yates

Content Lead

Adam is a content specialist with over 5 years experience in digital media, working on a variety of projects in and around fintech. Adam has moved into the blockchain space, and is now helping Apla to put ideas across in a simple but effective manner. He holds a Master’s degree in IT & IP law.
